name: Space, VR!
description: Space, VR! is VR in Space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 SP 1 Processor: i5-6600k Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivilent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: requires a 64 bit architecture
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4790k Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: requires a 64 bit architecture
